title: Phase 4.3: SEO Audit & Schema.org Implementation
description:
Comprehensive SEO audit and Schema.org structured data implementation.

**Assignee:** Debbie (Design/UX expertise for metadata)

**Tasks:**
1. Audit all pages for SEO completeness (meta descriptions, Open Graph, Twitter Cards)
2. Implement Person schema for Mike Jones (site-wide)
3. Implement WebSite schema (site-wide)
4. Add Article schema to case study pages
5. Verify all images have og:image tags (1200x630px)
6. Ensure meta descriptions are unique and compelling (150-160 chars)

**Pages to audit:**
- Homepage, About, Resume, Projects
- AI Memory System case study
- Local LLM case study
- NeighborhoodShare case study

**Implementation:**
- Add schemas via Ghost Settings → Code Injection
- Test with Google Rich Results Test
- Validate all structured data

**Deliverables:**
- SEO audit report
- Schema.org implementation complete
- All pages SEO optimized

**Can run in parallel with:** Alice's QA fixes, Substack integration

**Estimated time:** 3-4 hours
